title: Circus Poster
content:
Hi all,  
This poster was in a topic somewhere else on the forums, but the fonts were not listed. Could someone ID what appears to be all three fonts?

[http://www.flatface.net/~johnmiles/vbscolordesignpreview.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071215122721/http:/www.flatface.net/~johnmiles/vbscolordesignpreview.jpg "http://www.flatface.net/~johnmiles/vbscolordesignpreview.jpg")

-Will

 [‹ (x) estate agency font - Friz Quadrata {Mike}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071215122721/http:/www.typophile.com/node/13179 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Nutrition facts on food product labels - (generally) Helvetica {Lex} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071215122721/http:/www.typophile.com/node/12618 "Go to next forum topic")
author: winglets747

comments.content:
The ornamental font is [Rodeo Clown.](http://web.archive.org/web/20071215122721/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/rodeo-clown/rodeo-clown/testdrive.html?s=UNDER+GOD%27S+BIG+TOP&p=48)

Slab might be [Egyptienne](http://web.archive.org/web/20071215122721/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itfmecanorma/egyptienne/) and [Egyptienne Extended](http://web.archive.org/web/20071215122721/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=UR.109813.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=MOSES+THE+GREAT&sampleSize=48)

Vacation Bible School 2005 is [Buckhorn](http://web.archive.org/web/20071215122721/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/buckhorn/buckhorn/testdrive.html?s=VACATION+BIBLE+SCHOOL&p=48) (except for the initials)
